about.title: About
about.body: Mechanical engineer with over 10 years in mechanical design and production environments. I specialize in turning ideas into manufacturable solutions through precise CAD modeling, technical drawings, and shop-ready documentation. My experience covers architectural components, mining equipment, and industrial projects, working closely with clients and production teams from concept to fabrication.
